verses.verse: Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> [opposite] <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>
Now <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

So <S%H4124>Moab<s%> was in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H9076>fear<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> for they were <S%H7227>numerous;<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> was in <S%H6973>dread<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H6258>"Now<s%> this <S%H6951>horde<s%> will <S%H3897>lick<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H5439>around<s%> us, as the <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H3897>licks<s%> up the <S%H3418>grass<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>" And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> at that <S%H6256>time.<s%>

So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor,<s%> at <S%H6604>Pethor,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>near<s%> the <S%H5104>River,<s%> [in] the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H5869>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they are <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H4480>opposite<s%> <S%H4136><s%> me.

<S%H6258>"Now,<s%> therefore, <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H1980>come,<s%> <S%H779>curse<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> for me <S%H3588>since<s%> they are <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H6099>mighty<s%> for me; <S%H194>perhaps<s%> I may be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5221>defeat<s%> them and <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land.<s%> For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that he <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H1288>bless<s%> is <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> and he <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H779>curse<s%> is <S%H779>cursed.<s%>"

So the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> with the [fees for] <S%H7081>divination<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> and <S%H1696>repeated<s%> Balak's <S%H1697>words<s%> to him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3885>"Spend<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> and I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to you as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> may <S%H1696>speak<s%> to me." And the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> with <S%H1109>Balaam.<s%>
Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> with you?"

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1111>"Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> [word] to me,

<S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> there is a <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and they <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H5869>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H1980>come,<s%> <S%H6895>curse<s%> them for me; <S%H194>perhaps<s%> I may be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them, and <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out.' "
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "Do not <S%H1980>go<s%> with them; you shall not <S%H779>curse<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> for they are <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>"

So <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to Balak's <S%H8269>leaders,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> <S%H1980>back<s%> to your <S%H776>land,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5414>let<s%> me <S%H1980>go<s%> with you."

And the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1109>"Balaam<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H1980>come<s%> with us."

Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H3254><s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8269>leaders,<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H7227>numerous<s%> and <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H3513>distinguished<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H428>former.<s%>

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor,<s%> 'Let <S%H408>nothing,<s%> I <S%H4994>beg<s%> you, <S%H4513>hinder<s%> you from <S%H1980>coming<s%> to me;

for I will <S%H3513>indeed<s%> <S%H3513>honor<s%> you <S%H3966>richly,<s%> and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H559>say<s%> to me. <S%H4994>Please<s%> <S%H1980>come<s%> then, <S%H6895>curse<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> for me.' "

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H518>"Though<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> were to <S%H5414>give<s%> me his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> I <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H6213>do<s%> anything, either <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H5674>contrary<s%> to the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H4994>please,<s%> you <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3427>stay<s%> <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H3915>tonight,<s%> and I will <S%H3045>find<s%> out <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3254>else<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to me."

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> at <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H518>"If<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> you, <S%H6965>rise<s%> up [and] <S%H1980>go<s%> with them; but <S%H389>only<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you shall you <S%H6213>do.<s%>"
So <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H860>donkey,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> with the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H639>angry<s%> <S%H2734><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was <S%H1980>going,<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3320>took<s%> his <S%H3320>stand<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> as an <S%H7854>adversary<s%> against him. Now he was <S%H7392>riding<s%> on his <S%H860>donkey<s%> and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5288>servants<s%> were with him.

When the <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5324>standing<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> with his <S%H8025>drawn<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> the <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H5186>turned<s%> off from the <S%H1870>way<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> into the <S%H7704>field;<s%> but <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H860>donkey<s%> to <S%H5186>turn<s%> her <S%H5186>back<s%> into the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in a <S%H4934>narrow<s%> <S%H4934>path<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> [with] a <S%H1447>wall<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>side<s%> and a <S%H1447>wall<s%> on that <S%H2088>side.<s%>

When the <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> she <S%H3905>pressed<s%> herself to the <S%H7023>wall<s%> and <S%H3905>pressed<s%> Balaam's <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> so he <S%H5221>struck<s%> her <S%H3254>again.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H3254>further,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in a <S%H9495>narrow<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H5186>turn<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> or the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

When the <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> she <S%H7257>lay<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam;<s%> so <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> was <S%H639>angry<s%> <S%H2734><s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H860>donkey<s%> with his <S%H4731>stick.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H860>donkey,<s%> and she <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> to you, that you have <S%H5221>struck<s%> me <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7272>times<s%>?"

Then <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H860>donkey,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> you have <S%H9412>made<s%> a <S%H9412>mockery<s%> of me! <S%H3863>If<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H3426>had<s%> <S%H3426>been<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> I would have <S%H2026>killed<s%> you by <S%H6258>now.<s%>"

And the <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "Am I not your <S%H860>donkey<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H7392>ridden<s%> <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H5750><s%> your <S%H5750>life<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>? Have I <S%H5532>ever<s%> been <S%H5532>accustomed<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> to you?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"No.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1540>opened<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5324>standing<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> with his <S%H8025>drawn<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he <S%H6915>bowed<s%> all the <S%H7812>way<s%> to the <S%H639>ground.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5921>"Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> have you <S%H5221>struck<s%> your <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7272>times<s%>? <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H3318>come<s%> out as an <S%H7854>adversary,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> was <S%H3399>contrary<s%> to me.

"But the <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> me and <S%H5186>turned<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> from me <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7272>times.<s%> <S%H194>If<s%> she had not <S%H5186>turned<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> from me, I would <S%H3588>surely<s%> have <S%H2026>killed<s%> you just <S%H6258>now,<s%> and let her <S%H2421>live.<s%>"

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "I have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> for I did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that you were <S%H5324>standing<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H7122>against<s%> me. <S%H6258>Now<s%> then, <S%H518>if<s%> it is <S%H7489>displeasing<s%> to you, I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back.<s%>"

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> with the <S%H376>men,<s%> but you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H657>only<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I shall <S%H1696>tell<s%> you." So <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> along with the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H1111>Balak.<s%>

When <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> was <S%H935>coming,<s%> he <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him at the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> <S%H1366>border,<s%> at the <S%H7097>extreme<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H1366>border.<s%>

Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "Did I not <S%H7971>urgently<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> to you to <S%H7121>call<s%> you? <S%H4100>Why<s%> did you not <S%H1980>come<s%> to me? Am I <S%H552>really<s%> <S%H3808>unable<s%> <S%H3201><s%> to <S%H3513>honor<s%> you?"

So <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> to you! Am I <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3972>anything<s%> at all? The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7760>puts<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> that I shall <S%H1696>speak.<s%>"
And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> with <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to Kiriath-huzoth.

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> [some] to <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> and the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with him.

Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> that <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and <S%H5927>brought<s%> him up to the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal;<s%> and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H7097>portion<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
